languages.text: {n}Вы видите вашего верного пилота — видимо, потеряв Вольного Торговца, он отправился выяснять, где Лорд-капитан. Из вокса, зажатого в руке, доносится... ваш собственный голос, уверяющий пилота, что все в порядке, и Вольный Торговец вернется к шаттлу, когда закончит изучать бумаги о податях. Судя по съехавшимся к переносице бровям, пилот испытывает сомнения в том, стоит ли ему действительно подчиниться или нет.{/n}

{n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. You hear a voice coming out of the vox in his hand — your own voice, telling the pilot that everything is in order and that you will return to the shuttle once you are done examining the tithe documents. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы видите вашего верного пилота — видимо, потеряв Вольного Торговца, он отправился выяснять, где Лорд-капитан. Из вокса, зажатого в руке, доносится... ваш собственный голос, уверяющий пилота, что все в порядке, и Вольный Торговец вернется к шаттлу, когда закончит изучать бумаги о податях. Судя по съехавшимся к переносице бровям, пилот испытывает сомнения в том, стоит ли ему действительно подчиниться или нет.{/n}

{n}The guard blocks the way with his weapon.{/n} "This is as far as you go. Get out of here."

languages.text: {n}你看到了你信任的穿梭机驾驶员。看起来，当你失踪的时候，他就冲出来找你了。随后，你听到他手中的音阵装置响了起来，传来的却是你自己的声音。“你”告诉驾驶员，说目前一切顺利，等什一税的相关文件检查完毕之后，你就会返回穿梭机。不过，从驾驶员皱着的眉头来看，他似乎并不确信是否该服从这样的命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. You hear a voice coming out of the vox in his hand — your own voice, telling the pilot that everything is in order and that you will return to the shuttle once you are done examining the tithe documents. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到了你信任的穿梭机驾驶员。看起来，当你失踪的时候，他就冲出来找你了。随后，你听到他手中的音阵装置响了起来，传来的却是你自己的声音。“你”告诉驾驶员，说目前一切顺利，等什一税的相关文件检查完毕之后，你就会返回穿梭机。不过，从驾驶员皱着的眉头来看，他似乎并不确信是否该服从这样的命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ves a tu fiel piloto de lanzadera. Parece que partió en busca de su Lord Capitán cuando desapareció. Oyes una voz que sale del voco que lleva en la mano. Es tu voz, informando al piloto de que todo está en orden y volverás a la lanzadera en cuanto termines de revisar los documentos del diezmo. A juzgar por su ceño fruncido, el piloto tiene serias dudas sobre seguir las órdenes que recibe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. You hear a voice coming out of the vox in his hand — your own voice, telling the pilot that everything is in order and that you will return to the shuttle once you are done examining the tithe documents. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves a tu fiel piloto de lanzadera. Parece que partió en busca de su Lord Capitán cuando desapareció. Oyes una voz que sale del voco que lleva en la mano. Es tu voz, informando al piloto de que todo está en orden y volverás a la lanzadera en cuanto termines de revisar los documentos del diezmo. A juzgar por su ceño fruncido, el piloto tiene serias dudas sobre seguir las órdenes que recibe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Güvenilir mekik pilotunu görüyorsun. Anlaşılan sen kaybolduğunda Lord Kaptan'ı aramaya gitmiş. Elindeki telsizden bir ses geliyor... Kendi sesin, pilota her şeyin yolunda olduğunu ve aşar belgelerini inceledikten sonra mekiğe döneceğini söylüyor. Çatık kaşlarından anlaşıldığı kadarıyla pilot, verdiğin emre uymak konusunda çekince duyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. You hear a voice coming out of the vox in his hand — your own voice, telling the pilot that everything is in order and that you will return to the shuttle once you are done examining the tithe documents. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Güvenilir mekik pilotunu görüyorsun. Anlaşılan sen kaybolduğunda Lord Kaptan'ı aramaya gitmiş. Elindeki telsizden bir ses geliyor... Kendi sesin, pilota her şeyin yolunda olduğunu ve aşar belgelerini inceledikten sonra mekiğe döneceğini söylüyor. Çatık kaşlarından anlaşıldığı kadarıyla pilot, verdiğin emre uymak konusunda çekince duyuyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}信頼するシャトルのパイロットが見えた。あなたが姿を消したとき、彼はロード・キャプテンを探しに行ったようだ。彼の手にあるヴォックスから声が聞こえる—あなた自身の声で、すべて問題ないこと、租税の書類の調査が終わり次第シャトルに戻るとパイロットに伝えている。彼のしかめっ面から判断すると、パイロットは受けている命令にいくぶん疑念を抱いているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. You hear a voice coming out of the vox in his hand — your own voice, telling the pilot that everything is in order and that you will return to the shuttle once you are done examining the tithe documents. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}信頼するシャトルのパイロットが見えた。あなたが姿を消したとき、彼はロード・キャプテンを探しに行ったようだ。彼の手にあるヴォックスから声が聞こえる—あなた自身の声で、すべて問題ないこと、租税の書類の調査が終わり次第シャトルに戻るとパイロットに伝えている。彼のしかめっ面から判断すると、パイロットは受けている命令にいくぶん疑念を抱いているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous apercevez votre fidèle pilote de navette : il semblerait qu'il se soit lancé à la recherche de {rt_mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} en constatant votre disparition. Vous entendez une voix résonner dans le vox qu'il tient dans sa main : il s'agit de la vôtre, qui lui explique que tout va bien et que vous rejoindrez la navette dès que vous aurez terminé d'examiner les documents de la dîme. À en juger par ses sourcils froncés, le pilote semble remettre en question les ordres qu'il reçoit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. You hear a voice coming out of the vox in his hand — your own voice, telling the pilot that everything is in order and that you will return to the shuttle once you are done examining the tithe documents. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous apercevez votre fidèle pilote de navette : il semblerait qu'il se soit lancé à la recherche de {rt_mf|son seigneur-capitaine|sa seigneure-capitaine} en constatant votre disparition. Vous entendez une voix résonner dans le vox qu'il tient dans sa main : il s'agit de la vôtre, qui lui explique que tout va bien et que vous rejoindrez la navette dès que vous aurez terminé d'examiner les documents de la dîme. À en juger par ses sourcils froncés, le pilote semble remettre en question les ordres qu'il reçoit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du siehst deinen vertrauten Shuttlepiloten ... offenbar hat er nach seinem Lord Captain gesucht, als du verschwunden bist. Aus dem Vox in seiner Hand ertönt eine Stimme ... deine Stimme, die dem Piloten sagt, dass alles in Ordnung sei und du nach der Prüfung der Zehntdokumente umgehend zum Shuttle zurückkehren wirst. Seiner gerunzelten Stirn nach ist sich der Pilot nicht ganz sicher, ober er die erhaltenen Befehle tatsächlich befolgen sollte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your trusted shuttle pilot — it seems he went looking for his Lord Captain when you disappeared. Judging by his furrowed brows, the pilot has some reservations about following the orders he is receiving.{/n}
